item.title: Moving from Engineer to Manager
item.description:

Here’s the book I recommend to read first. ðŸ“– You can’t beat Drucker.

So you are thinking about “going into management.” Here’s the problem. You don’t know what management even is.

âž¡ï¸ You don’t have visibility into what your boss even does. Your crappy 1-1s with your boss and various reporting is a small fraction of the job. The rest you don’t see.
